backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, leadership word submissions, activity submissions, and access control with maps and lists.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and QueryClient provider.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell with navigation, authentication controls, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: Component fetching and displaying top leadership words in a bar-chart-style list.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: Displays community micro‑solutions with loading and empty states, mapping challenge types to labels and rendering solution cards.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Wrapper component that renders a styled responsive section container for layout.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Gates child content behind Internet Identity authentication, showing a sign‑in prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/content/movieReferences.ts: Exports a list of movie reference strings used for quotes and citations.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Provides structured proposal metadata and text fields including title, author info, abstracts, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Defines an ordered list of academic references with stable keys for display and citation use.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting leadership word data, micro‑solutions, and activity quotes via the actor API with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Displays an overview of Activities 1 and 2 with descriptions and links to start each activity.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Implements Activity 1, allowing users to submit leadership word reflections and fetch affirmation quotes with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Implements Activity 2, enabling submission of resilient leadership scenarios, validation of heroic responses, and retrieval of supportive quotes.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Renders the author's bio, background, and social links using proposal content and styled components.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipBoardPage.t: Shows community leadership word patterns and shared micro‑solutions in a two‑column dashboard layout.
Renders a page showing learning outcomes from proposalContent with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/MovieReferencesPage.t: Displays a list of movie references from movieReferences with simple styled containers.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Shows a hero banner, abstract content, and quick links using proposalContent data.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Lists academic references from REFERENCES in styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Displays key takeaways from proposalContent with icons and styled sections.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Generates affirmation text based on leadership inputs using templates tied to leadership themes.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Detects themes in user input, selects a citation, and generates a validation message.
Maps UI challenge type string keys to backend ChallengeType enum variants.
frontend/src/utils/isVillainousInput.ts: Checks text for negative or harmful language using keyword and phrase matching.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Converts backend QuoteGenre enum values into readable franchise names.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Contains a curated list of Star Wars quotes and returns one deterministically by seed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts various error types into readable user messages, handling initialization, validation, network, backend, and generic failures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, and planned features for blocking negative responses with error code 000 and adding a Leadership Board tab.
